data.message: Just like to say thank you facebook guys for the awesome job you do. You cant please everyone all the time . but you can please some of the people some of the time. I'm one of them! You service has brought me in touch with a lot of lost friends and you made my birthday today very special. I wanted to like and comment on your post to me but there is no option there for that. I guess that would be my only complaint. I'd love to be able to say thank you easier!

replies.message: Thanks so much for your kinds words, Bob. We're glad to have you as part of our community. If you have any more suggestions, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1PPvEaI. -Abby
Just one more question guys. I heard you were going to add a dislike button on our feeds. Is that true or just media hearsay?
I reported a profile twice.I'm trying to tell you that this person is representing facebook. He has your picture up.The name is John Blunden. He's trying to scam people saying you won money.
Where do I go to say I lost admin to a page? Not by anyone.. because I was the only admin.. it mysteriously went..

Facebook Before this recent change, There was an area on the left side That  had a  place where you could put the names of favorites of movies, music, books, & likes.I can't find it. I really want my list of LIKES. Thank you
